New Records: Australia set the highest-ever T20 international first powerplay score of 113/1 for the opening six overs
Key Match Events: Josh Inglis scored a blistering century to propel Australia to 196/4 in 20 overs
Scotland were bowled out for 126 in 16.4 overs
Marcus Stoinis wrapped things up, Australia put the series to bed with a clinical win
Post-Match Reflections: Australia took an unassailable 2-0 lead in the three-match series
Miscellaneous Highlights: Scotland struggled to build on a positive start with the bat
The series is in the bag for Australia, with a match still to go
Others: George Munsey departed immediately after being given a life
Scotland lost their last 6 wickets for just 20 runs, in the span of 26 balls
